entries.title: The Integrity Flywheel
entries.content: proofs_first → publish_later: Generate cryptographic proofs before publishing results. This pattern ensures that all claims are verifiable and prevents retroactive manipulation.

entries.title: Fail-Closed Design
entries.content: All security-critical operations should fail closed. When in doubt, reject. This is especially critical for Ihsān enforcement - if ethical score cannot be verified, the operation fails.

entries.title: SNR-Weighted Prioritization
entries.content: Use Signal-to-Noise Ratio (SNR) scoring for all decision points. Signal = Clarity × Synergy × Consistency. Noise = Entropy + Quantization + Disagreement. Only propagate outputs with SNR ≥ 0.80.

entries.title: Standing on Shoulders of Giants
entries.content: Every reasoning session should seed from accumulated wisdom. Cross-temporal bridges connect present decisions to 3 years of crystallized patterns. Historical patterns inform current decisions.

entries.title: Ihsān - Excellence in Ethics
entries.content: The Arabic concept of Ihsān means 'excellence' - doing beautiful work because it is right. All BIZRA operations must meet the Ihsān threshold (IM ≥ 0.95). This is non-negotiable.

entries.title: Proof of Impact ≠ Proof of Work
entries.content: Contribution value should be measured by actual impact, not computational effort. Impact = Σ(Artifact × SignificanceWeight × TemporalDecay). This enables fair reward distribution.

entries.title: APEX 7-Layer Architecture
entries.content: L1 Blockchain → L2 DePIN → L3 Execution → L4 Cognitive → L5 Economic → L6 Governance → L7 Philosophy (Ihsān). Each layer has distinct responsibilities with clean interfaces.

entries.title: External Oracle for Goodhart Fix
entries.content: Self-referential scoring systems fall prey to Goodhart's Law. Use external oracle verification with spot-checking (10%) and drift detection (>15% shift triggers alert).
